page.title: 05Life styles - Family holiday
page.content: This year we are going to Cornwall for our summer holiday, we have been there twice before and we shall stay for two weeks. For the first week we shall stay in a farmhouse at St. Ives, and then we shall go to Helstone on the Lizard Peninsula. The total cost for food and accommodation will be Â£504 for the four of us. The journey from our home near Huddersfield will be approximately 300 miles, and the petrol at Â£1.99 per gallon will cost us Â£40 for the return journey. The journey will be motorways. My family usually have two holidays each year. We have two weeks in the Summer, and a shorter one of four or five days which we spend nearer home.
